title: Software Engineer Inter ·
description: Implemented a core component to centralize and display critical Chase CB capabilities, facilitating the usage of these tools for developer teams across the firm. Successfully pitched this component to Chase's CB CFO and executive directors, achieving unanimous approval. Additionally, developed a new proxy endpoint to automatically gather and format capabilities data, making it easily accessible for any Chase Engineering & Architecture team.

title: Software Engineer Inter ·
description: Designed, developed, and deployed a multi-tenant internal tool for backend developers at Chase Travel to streamline the retrieval, review, and customization of settings and configurations across various environments. The tool reduced configuration time by 80% and decreased error rates by 90%. It features multi-tenant support via command line, Azure Entra Authentication for enhanced security, and a mock application version for safe feature testing.
